comments:
Build 20021016, Win98.

Was trying to open the Export Wizard and it wasn't working due to a refresh 
problem on one of the views.  Not sure which view and cannot recreate the 
problem, but I had to exit my workspace.  Also got an NPE during shutdown as 
indicated below.

Attached entire log file for more information.

Filed bug 25051 for the PDE NPEs.

The SWTExceptions hers are due to running out of image handles on Win98.
This is a known problem on Win98 since it has very few image handles available.
Not much we can do about it.



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2078 ***
